entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2 except minus 5 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2 except minus 5 inland. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
